DOC.brief_summary: This study involve completion questionnaire , computer-based cognitive task alcohol drink session . Participation study consist initial , in-person screening appointment , 4 brief daily appointment research office , alcohol drinking session local bar follow-up appointment 1-3 day alcohol drink session . Participants find eligible screening phase complete daily appointment 4 day 5-day period ( i.e. , 1 day 5 attend appointment ) . Each appointment last 20 minute , average consist questionnaire computer-based cognitive task . On day fourth appointment , participant complete alcohol drink session . The alcohol drinking session begin 4pm last least midnight . Participants study young adult age 21-25 , regularly drink alcohol currently seek treatment alcohol use . Seventy-two participant complete study .
DOC.brief_title: Second Young Adult Naturalistic Alcohol Study
DOC.criteria: Be age 2125 . Be able read English complete study evaluation . Drink alcohol regular basis No participant may : Be seek treatment alcohol addictive behavior inpatient intensive outpatient treatment within past 12 month . Provide two positive breath alcohol concentration ( BAC ) reading ( i.e. , > 0.00 % ) follow time : inperson screening , presession screening , outset alcohol selfadministration session . After participant blow first positive BAC , allow reschedule participate another time , however blow second positive BAC , exclude study offer referral alcohol treatment . Have positive urine screen result inperson screen presession screen day alcohol selfadministration session opiate , cocaine , phencyclidine , amphetamine , methamphetamine , barbiturate , methadone benzodiazepine . A woman pregnant , nursing , refuse use reliable method birth control . Fail perform normative level screen four cognitive psychomotor task administer study . Participants must perform within two standard deviation mean sample relevant prior study Perform computer task initially administer baseline either random inordinately slow fashion A body mass index lower 18.5 great 35 .
